#summary How to check out GeoBeagle into Eclipse.

= Prequisites =

Make sure you have subclipse installed.
Set up the plugin location in your workspace per:  http://code.google.com/android/intro/installing.html

= Checking out `GeoBeagle` =

  * Window / Show View / SVN Repositories
  * Click on the "+" sign
  * Url: `https://geobeagle.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/`
  * Right click GeoBeagle, Checkout....  Use the defaults and click Finish.
  * Select Android/Android Project
  * Project name: GeoBeagle, Package name: com.google.code.geobeagle, Activity name: geobeagle, Application name: geobeagle.
  * Confirm overwrite
  * Right click on project icon, select Properties.  Select Java Build Path / Libraries / Add External JARs... select android.jar
